content.rendered:
Fake news hurts real

An outdoor campaign warning the general public against the fake news menace.

In this world full of deep fakes and hate mongers, all it takes to trigger an avalanche of destruction is baseless or concocted facts and information. As Kerala’s crusader for straight and bold journalism, Asianet News wanted to warn the general public about this.
